Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2253 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.13.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-2253 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.13.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package skopeo is earlier than 1.13.3-1, affected by CVE-2023-2253
